lines.text: Hey check that goat for scorch marks on its hooves!
Scorch marks! Evidence that they were on fire!
Seeker, what are you on about?
Like, what if the goat caught fire and started prancing around the room?
Well, it's- it's tied up, on the side of the room without-
Maybe it was tied up afterwards! Check them feets!
I mean, imagine it! A goat ablaze, running around the room, setting everything on fire!
It's the best mental image I've ever had in my whole life, and I love it.
Sure. Fine. Now let's get on mental images that help solve the dang case.
